uk.co.benashwell.CartoonDrawing

Class DrawingCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • uk.co.benashwell.CartoonDrawing.DrawingCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DrawingCanvas
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    DrawingCanvas class extends Jpanel and is used to set up the panel which will be used to place the images on.
    Author:
    Ben Ashwell, Martin Key, Abel Toro
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPic(java.lang.String filename, int x, int y)
      This Method creates a Picture Object using the parameters given it then runs the add picture method in the VectorOfPictures Object and then lastly repaints the canvas

      Method to add a text box to the canvas

      This method clears the screen by calling the VectorOfPictures method clearPictures and then repaints the canvas

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Paint Component method calls the super method and then runs method draw all in the VectorOfPictures Object
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent

      • addPic

        public void addPic(java.lang.String filename,
          int x,
          int y)
        This Method creates a Picture Object using the parameters given it then runs the add picture method in the VectorOfPictures Object and then lastly repaints the canvas
        Parameters:
        filename - file name of picture to be added
        x - x co ordinate of click
        y - y co ordinate of click

      • addText

        public void addText(java.lang.String filename,
           java.lang.String caption,
           int x,
           int y)
        Method to add a text box to the canvas
        Parameters:
        filename - filename of textbox
        caption - the caption to go within the text box
        x - x position of click
        y - y position of click

      • clear

        public void clear()
        This method clears the screen by calling the VectorOfPictures method clearPictures and then repaints the canvas

      • removepicture

        public void removepicture(int x,
                 int y)
        This method calls removepicture to remove one image from the canvas then repaints the canvas
        Parameters:
        x - x co ordinate of picture to remove
        y - y co ordinate of picture to remove
